verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> those things, that he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4068>Madon,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8110>Shimron,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H407>Achshaph,<s%>

And to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and of the <S%H6160>plains<s%> <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth,<s%> and in the <S%H8219>valley,<s%> and in the <S%H5299>borders<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> on the <S%H3220>west,<s%>

And to the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> and on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and to the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and to the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpeh.<s%>

And they <S%H3318>went<s%> out, they and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4264>hosts<s%> with them, <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> even as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore<s%> in <S%H7230>multitude,<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%>

And when <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> were <S%H3259>met<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4792>Merom,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of them: for to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them up <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> you shall <S%H6131>hamstring<s%> their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H4818>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with him, <S%H5921>against<s%> them by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4792>Merom<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly;<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> on them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H7291>chased<s%> them to <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> and to <S%H4956>Misrephothmaim,<s%> and to the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> <S%H4217>eastward;<s%> and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, <S%H5704>until<s%> they <S%H7604>left<s%> them <S%H1115>none<s%> <S%H8300>remaining.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to them as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>bade<s%> him: he <S%H6131>hamstrung<s%> their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> their <S%H4818>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof with the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> for <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> was the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%>

And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> utterly <S%H2763>destroying<s%> them: there was not <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> to <S%H5397>breathe:<s%> and he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of them, did <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>take,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and he utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them, as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

But as for the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> still in their <S%H8510>strength,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of them, <S%H2108>save<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H905>only;<s%> that did <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8313>burn.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> to <S%H1992>themselves;<s%> but <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> they <S%H5221>smote<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> they <S%H3605>any<s%> to <S%H5397>breathe.<s%>

As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> did <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> he <S%H5493>left<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H5493>undone<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5045>south<s%> country, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> and the <S%H8219>valley,<s%> and the <S%H6160>plain,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H8219>valley<s%> of the same;

Even from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak,<s%> that <S%H5927>goes<s%> up to <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> even to <S%H1171>Baalgad<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> he <S%H3920>took,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> them.
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

There was not a <S%H5892>city<s%> that made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1115>save<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> other they <S%H3947>took<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

For it was of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H2388>harden<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> that they should <S%H7122>come<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that he might <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them utterly, and that they might <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H8467>favor,<s%> but that he might <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> from <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> from <S%H1688>Debir,<s%> from <S%H6024>Anab,<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them utterly with their <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

There was <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> in <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and in <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> there <S%H7604>remained.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H854>whole<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions<s%> by their <S%H7626>tribes.<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8252>rested<s%> from <S%H4421>war.<s%>
